languages.text: "Мир рушится, звезда погасла, а она ищет плюсы. Закалка настоящей пустотнорожденной!"
"The world is crumbling, the star has gone out, and she is looking for the positives. The grit of a true voidborn!"
languages.original_text: "Мир рушится, звезда погасла, а она ищет плюсы. Закалка настоящей пустотнорожденной!"

traits.locale_text: "The world is crumbling, the star has gone out, and she is looking for the positives. The grit of a true voidborn!"
"The world is crumbling, the star has gone out, and she is looking for the positives. The grit of a true voidborn!"
"The world is crumbling, the star has gone out, and she is looking for the positives. The grit of a true voidborn!"
"The world is crumbling, the star has gone out, and she is looking for the positives. The grit of a true voidborn!"
"The world is crumbling, the star has gone out, and she is looking for the positives. The grit of a true voidborn!"

languages.text: "Die Welt bröckelt, der Stern ist erloschen und sie sucht nach den positiven Aspekten. Der Kampfgeist eines wahren Kinds der Leere!"
languages.original_text: "The world is crumbling, the star has gone out, and she is looking for the positives. The grit of a true voidborn!"

traits.locale_text: "Die Welt bröckelt, der Stern ist erloschen und sie sucht nach den positiven Aspekten. Der Kampfgeist eines wahren Kinds der Leere!"

languages.text: « Le monde s'écroule, l'étoile s'est éteinte, et elle cherche encore à voir le verre à moitié plein, preuve qu'elle a l'étoffe d'une authentique hors-monde ! »
languages.original_text: "The world is crumbling, the star has gone out, and she is looking for the positives. The grit of a true voidborn!"

traits.locale_text: « Le monde s'écroule, l'étoile s'est éteinte, et elle cherche encore à voir le verre à moitié plein, preuve qu'elle a l'étoffe d'une authentique enfant du vide ! »

languages.text: «El mundo se desmorona, la estrella se ha extinguido y ella busca el lado positivo. ¡La entereza de los nacidos en el vacío!».
languages.original_text: "The world is crumbling, the star has gone out, and she is looking for the positives. The grit of a true voidborn!"

traits.locale_text: «El mundo se desmorona, la estrella se ha extinguido y ella busca el lado positivo. ¡La entereza de los nacidos en el vacío!».

languages.text: 「世界は崩れ落ちている。星は消え、彼女はポジティブなものを探している。真の虚空生まれの気骨をな！」
languages.original_text: "The world is crumbling, the star has gone out, and she is looking for the positives. The grit of a true voidborn!"

traits.locale_text: 「世界は崩れ落ちている。星は消え、彼女はポジティブなものを探している。真の虚空生まれの気骨をな！」

languages.text: “这个世界正在崩塌，恒星熄灭了，可她却在努力寻找希望。这才是真正的虚空之子该有的勇气！”
languages.original_text: "The world is crumbling, the star has gone out, and she is looking for the positives. The grit of a true voidborn!"

traits.locale_text: “这个世界正在崩塌，恒星熄灭了，可她却在努力寻找希望。这才是真正的虚空之子该有的勇气！”

languages.original_text: "The world is crumbling, the star has gone out, and she is looking for the positives. The grit of a true voidborn!"

languages.text: "Dünya yok oluşun eşiğinde, yıldız ortadan kayboldu, o ise durumun olumlu yönlerini arıyor. Hakiki bir uçsuzdoğan cesareti!"
languages.original_text: "The world is crumbling, the star has gone out, and she is looking for the positives. The grit of a true voidborn!"
